articles.description: Lamborghini is all set to launch the Urus S in India on April 13, 2023. The Urus S is the updated version of the Urus and is positioned below the Urus Performante. It weighs 47 kg more than the Performante and gets different wheels and fewer carbon fibre deta…
articles.content:
Lamborghini is all set to launch the Urus S in India on April 13, 2023.

articles.title: Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw to retire from Infosys Board, D Sundaram appointed lead independent director - The Economic Times
articles.description: ​​The board has appointed D Sundaram as the lead independent director based on the recommendation of the company's nomination and remuneration committee.
articles.content: Infosys on Thursday announced the retirement of Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw as an independent director of the Board effective March 22, upon completion of her tenure. The board has appointed D Sundaram as th… [+1316 chars]
